guide.subTitle: bulletin board search type
guide.description1: SearchFilter Components are search filters that can usually be used on bulletin-type pages.
guide.description2: This component uses search by user group and by period as an example.
guide.description3: In addition, the component displays the result value when searching, and the result value depends on whether the detailed search is ON/OFF.

props.datePickerOption: Modify the calendar, or specify the options to use for initialization.

guide.subTitle: Common Popup Configuration
guide.description1: Modal components have attached examples of how Modal can be configured in common.
guide.description2: These components can be dynamically changed using the options below.

example.subTitle1: Enter or select the option below and click the button.
example.subTitle2: Clicking the button without selecting an option sets the default value.
example.isSearchForm: Whether to use the search form
example.isMultipleListCheckbox: List check box enabled or disabled

guide.subTitle: TextField The component that copies the template. Components can be changed.
guide.action: You can copy the template by clicking the Add button.

props.maxTemplateCount: Maximum number of templates to replicate. (Basic 2 / Max 10)

guide.subTitle: This is a typical example of a chart. (Chart.js)
